snippet.title: Like A Dragon: Ishin! - 10 Minutes of Gameplay | TGS 2022
snippet.description:
Watch 10 minutes of new Like a Dragon: Ishin! gameplay, in which we explore the mean streets of 19th century Japan while getting a feel for the series’s transition to Unreal Engine 4 on PS5. Upcoming remake, Like a Dragon: Ishin!, releases on February 21, 2023 for PS5, PS4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming #LikeADragonIshin
